%3pa.Name: Percent of Team's 3 Point Field Goals Attempted
%3pa.Definition: The percentage of a team's 3 point field goals attempted that a player has while on the court

%3pm.Name: Percent of Team's 3 Point Field Goals Made
%3pm.Definition: The percentage of a team's 3 point field goals that a player has made while on the court

%ast.Name: Percent of Team's Assists
%ast.Definition: The percentage of a team's assists that a player has while on the court

%blk.Name: Percent of Team's Blocks
%blk.Definition: The percentage of a team's blocks that a player has while on the court

%blka.Name: Percent of Team's Blocked Field Goal Attempts
%blka.Definition: The percentage of a team's own blocked field goal attempts that a player has while on the court

%dreb.Name: Percent of Team's Defensive Rebounds
%dreb.Definition: The percentage of a team's defensive rebounds that a player has while on the court

%fga.Name: Percent of Team's Field Goals Attempted
%fga.Definition: The percentage of a team's field goals attempted that a player has attempted while on the court

%fga 2pt.Name: Percent of Field Goals Attempted (2 Pointers)
%fga 2pt.Definition: The percentage of field goals attempted by a player or team that are 2 pointers

%fga 3pt.Name: Percent of Field Goals Attempted (3 Pointers)
%fga 3pt.Definition: The percentage of field goals attempted by a player or team that are 3 pointers

%fgm.Name: Percent of Team's Field Goals Made
%fgm.Definition: The percentage of a team's made field goals that a player has made while on the court

%fta.Name: Percent of Team's Free Throws Attempted
%fta.Definition: The percentage of a team's free throws attempted that a player has attempted while on the court

%ftm.Name: Percent of Team's Free Throws Made
%ftm.Definition: The percentage of a team's made free throws that a player has made while on the court

%oreb.Name: Percent of Team's Offensive Rebounds
%oreb.Definition: The percentage of a team's offensive rebounds that a player has while on the court

%pf.Name: Percent of Team's Personal Fouls
%pf.Definition: The percentage of a team's personal fouls that a player has while on the court

%pfd.Name: Percent of Team's Personal Fouls Drawn
%pfd.Definition: The percentage of a team's personal fouls drawn that a player has while on the court

%pts.Name: Percent of Team's Points
%pts.Definition: The percentage of a team's points that a player has while on the court

%pts 2pt.Name: Percent of Points (2-Point Field Goals)
%pts 2pt.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from 2 point field goals

%pts 2pt mr.Name: Percent of Points (2-Point Field Goals: Mid Range)
%pts 2pt mr.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are that are from mid-range field goals (2 point field goals from outside the paint)

%pts 3pt.Name: Percent of Points (3-Point Field Goals)
%pts 3pt.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from 3 point field goals

%pts fbps.Name: Percent of Points (Fast Break Points)
%pts fbps.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from fast break opportunities

%pts ft.Name: Percent of Points (Free Throws)
%pts ft.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are from free throws

%pts off to.Name: Percent of Points (Off Turnovers)
%pts off to.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are scored on the possession after forcing an opponent turnover

%pts pitp.Name: Percent of Points (Points in the Paint)
%pts pitp.Definition: The percentage of points scored by a player or team that are scored in the paint

%stl.Name: Percent of Team's Steals
%stl.Definition: The percentage of a team's steals that a player has while on the court

%tov.Name: Percent of Team's Turnovers
%tov.Definition: The percentage of a team's turnovers that a player has while on the court

2fg freq.Name: 2 Point Field Goal Frequency
2fg freq.Definition: The percentage of opponent field goal attempts that fit the specified criteria Formula (2FGA)/(FGA)

2fg%.Name: 2 Point Field Goal Percentage
2fg%.Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goal attempts of a specified criteria that a player or team makes Formula (2FGM)/(2FGA)

2fga.Name: 2 Point Field Goals Attempted
2fga.Definition: The number of 2 point field goals that a player or team has attempted that fit the specified criteria

2fgm.Name: 2 Point Field Goals Made
2fgm.Definition: The number of 2 point field goals that a player or team has made that fit the specified criteria

2fgm %ast.Name: Percent of 2 Point Field Goals Made Assisted
2fgm %ast.Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goals made by a player or team that are assisted by a teammate

2fgm %uast.Name: Percent of 2 Point Field Goals Made Unassisted
2fgm %uast.Definition: The percentage of 2 point field goals made by a player or team that are not assisted by a teammate

2nd pts.Name: Second Chance Points
2nd pts.Definition: The percentage of isolation plays where a player or team shoots free throws as the result of a shooting foul

3fg freq.Name: 3 Point Field Goal Frequency
3fg freq.Definition: The percentage of opponent field goal attempts of the specified criteria that are 3 point attempts Formula (3FGA)/(FGA)

3fgm %ast.Name: 3 Pointers Made (Percent Assisted)
3fgm %ast.Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goals made that are assisted by a teammate

3fgm %uast.Name: 3 Pointers Made (Percent Unassisted)
3fgm %uast.Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goals made that are not assisted by a teammate

3p%.Name: 3 Point Field Goal Percentage
3p%.Definition: The percentage of 3 point field goal attempts that a player makes Formula (3PM)/(3PA)

3pa.Name: 3 Point Field Goals Attempted
3pa.Definition: The number of 3 point field goals that a player or team has attempted

3pm.Name: 3 Point Field Goals Made
3pm.Definition: The number of 3 point field goals that a player or team has made

+/-.Name: Plus-Minus
+/-.Definition: The point differential when a player or team is on the floor

adjusted dreb chance %.Name: Adjusted Defensive Rebound Chance Percentage
adjusted dreb chance %.Definition: Percentage of rebounds gathered when given a rebound chance on defense; excludes all deferred rebounds Formula (DREB)/(DREB Chances - Deferred DREB Chances)

adjusted oreb chance %.Name: Adjusted Offensive Rebound Chance Percentage
adjusted oreb chance %.Definition: Percentage of rebounds gathered when given a rebound chance on offense; excludes all deferred rebounds Formula (OREB)/(OREB Chances - Deferred OREB Chances)

adjusted reb chance %.Name: Adjusted Rebound Chance Percentage
adjusted reb chance %.Definition: Percentage of rebounds gathered when given a rebound chance; excludes all deferred rebounds Formula (REB)/(REB Chances - Deferred REB Chances)

and one freq.Name: And One Frequency
and one freq.Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team makes a field goal while also being awarded a free throw attempt due to a shooting foul

ast.Name: Assists
ast.Definition: The number of assists -- passes that lead directly to a made basket -- by a player

ast adj.Name: Assists Adjusted
ast adj.Definition: The total sum of a player or team's assists, free throw assists, and secondary assists

ast per 100 events.Definition: Assists by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

ast pts created.Name: Assist Points Created
ast pts created.Definition: Points created by a player or team through their assists

ast ratio.Name: Assist Ratio
ast ratio.Definition: Assist Ratio is the number of assists a player averages per 100 possessions used Formula (AST * 100) / (POSS)

ast to pass%.Name: Assist to Pass Percentage
ast to pass%.Definition: The percentage of passes by a player or team that are assists Formula (Assists)/(Passes Made)

ast to pass% adj.Name: Assist to Pass Percentage Adjusted
ast to pass% adj.Definition: The percentage of passes by a player or team that are assists, free throw assists, or secondary assists Formula (Adjusted Assists)/(Passes Made)

ast%.Name: Assist Percentage
ast%.Definition: The percentage of teammate field goals a player assisted on while he was on the floor Formula AST / (TmFGM - FGM)

ast/to.Name: Assist to Turnover Ratio
ast/to.Definition: The number of assists for a player or team compared to the number of turnovers they have committed

avg dreb distance.Name: Average Defensive Rebound Distance
avg dreb distance.Definition: The average distance of a defensive rebound

avg drib per touch.Name: Average Dribbles per Touch
avg drib per touch.Definition: The average number of dribbles a player or team takes per touch

avg oreb distance.Name: Average Offensive Rebound Distance
avg oreb distance.Definition: The average distance of an offensive rebound

avg reb distance.Name: Average Rebound Distance
avg reb distance.Definition: The average distance of a rebound

avg sec per touch.Name: Average Seconds per Touch
avg sec per touch.Definition: The average number of seconds per touch by a player or team

avg speed.Name: Average Speed
avg speed.Definition: The average speed in miles per hour of all movements (sprinting, jogging, standing, walking) by a player or team while on the court

avg speed def.Name: Average Speed Defense
avg speed def.Definition: The average speed in miles per hour of all movements (sprinting, jogging, standing, walking) by a player or team while on defense

avg speed off.Name: Average Speed Offense
avg speed off.Definition: The average speed in miles per hour of all movements (sprinting, jogging, standing, walking) by a player or team while on offense

blk.Name: Blocks
blk.Definition: A block occurs when an offensive player attempts a shot, and the defense player tips the ball, blocking their chance to score

blka.Name: Opponent Blocks
blka.Definition: Number of times an opponent has registered a block on the shot of a player or team

boxouts.Name: Boxouts
boxouts.Definition: The number of times a player made physical contact with an opponent who was actively pursuing a rebound, showed visible progress or strong effort in disadvantaging the opponent, and successfully prevented that opponent from securing the rebound

catch shoot fg%.Name: Catch Shoot Field Goal Percentage
catch shoot fg%.Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on Catch and Shoot shots

catch shoot pts.Name: Catch Shoot Points
catch shoot pts.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on Catch and Shoot shots

charges drawn.Name: Charges Drawn
charges drawn.Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team draws a charge

close touch.Definition: Any touch where the player receives the ball within 5 feet of the basket

college break left.Name: College Break Left
college break left.Definition: A player takes five shots from the left break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

college break right.Name: College Break Right
college break right.Definition: A player takes five shots from the right break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

college corner left.Name: College Corner Left
college corner left.Definition: A player takes five shots from the left corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

college corner right.Name: College Corner Right
college corner right.Definition: A player takes five shots from the right corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

college top key.Name: College Top Key
college top key.Definition: A player takes five shots from the top of the key. The shot is from the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

contested 2pt shots.Name: Contested 2PT Shots
contested 2pt shots.Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team closes out and raises a hand to contest a 2 point shot prior to its release

contested 3pt shots.Name: Contested 3PT Shots
contested 3pt shots.Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team closes out and raises a hand to contest a 3 point shot prior to its release

contested dreb.Name: Contested Defensive Rebounds
contested dreb.Definition: A defensive rebound where an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder

contested dreb%.Name: Contested Defensive Rebound Percentage
contested dreb%.Definition: The percentage of defensive rebounds the player collects while an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder Formula (Contested DREB)/(DREB)

contested oreb.Name: Contested Offensive Rebounds
contested oreb.Definition: An offensive rebound where an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder

contested oreb%.Name: Contested Offensive Rebound Percentage
contested oreb%.Definition: The percentage of offensive rebounds the player collects while an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder Formula (Contested OREB)/(OREB)

contested reb.Name: Contested Rebounds
contested reb.Definition: A rebound where an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder

contested reb%.Name: Contested Rebound Percentage
contested reb%.Definition: The percentage of rebounds the player collects while an opponent is within 3.5 feet of the rebounder Formula (Contested REB)/(REB)

contested shot.Definition: Any shot where the closest defender is within 3.5 feet

contested shots.Name: Contested Shots
contested shots.Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team closes out and raises a hand to contest a shot prior to its release

cfg%.Name: Contested Field Goals Percentage
cfg%.Definition: The percentage of field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

cfga.Name: Contested Field Goals Attempted
cfga.Definition: The number of field goals the opposing players attempted while a defensive player was contesting

cfgm.Name: Contested Field Goals Made
cfgm.Definition: The number of field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

c3p%.Name: Contested Three Pointers Percentage
c3p%.Definition: The percentage of three-point field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

c3pa.Name: Contested Three Pointers Attempted
c3pa.Definition: The number of three-point field goals the opposing players took while a defensive player was contesting

c3pm.Name: Contested Three Pointers Made
c3pm.Definition: The number of three-point field goals the opposing players made while a defensive player was contesting

dd2.Name: Double Doubles
dd2.Definition: The number of double-doubles (double-digit number total in two of the five categories in a game) a player achieves

def fls.Name: Defensive Fouls
def fls.Definition: The number of non-shooting defensive fouls a defensive player committed while guarding a specific offensive player

def mu%.Name: Defensive Matchup Percentage
def mu%.Definition: The percentage of a defensive player’s overall possessions where he was guarding a specific offensive player

def ws.Name: Defensive Win Shares
def ws.Definition: Share of wins a player contributes to their team from defense

deferred dreb chances.Name: Deferred Defensive Rebound Chances
deferred dreb chances.Definition: The number of times that a player has a defensive rebound chance, but defers the rebound to a teammate

deferred oreb chances.Name: Deferred Offensive Rebound Chances
deferred oreb chances.Definition: The number of times that a player has an offensive rebound chance, but defers the rebound to a teammate

deferred reb chances.Name: Deferred Rebounds Chances
deferred reb chances.Definition: The number of times that a player has a rebound chance, but defers the rebound to a teammate

deflections.Name: Deflections
deflections.Definition: The number of times a defensive player or team gets his hand on the ball on a non-shot attempt

defrtg.Name: Defensive Rating
defrtg.Definition: The number of points allowed per 100 possessions by a team. For a player, it is the number of points per 100 possessions that the team allows while that individual player is on the court Formula 100*((Opp Points)/(Opp POSS))

det factor.Name: Deterrent Factor
det factor.Definition: The percentage of a player’s season average FGA output per Possession that he shot in a specific matchup Formula ((Matchup FGA)/Matchup Possessions)/(Player’s Season Average FGA per Possession)

dfg%.Name: Field Goals Defended at Rim Percent
dfg%.Definition: Percentage of field goal attempts the opponent makes while the player or team was defending the rim Formula (DFGM)/(DFGA)

dfga.Name: Defended Field Goals Attempted
dfga.Definition: The number of opponents shots attempted when a player or team is defending the shot

dfgm.Name: Defended Field Goals Made
dfgm.Definition: The number of opponents shots when a player or team is defending the shot

diff%.Name: Percentage Points Difference
diff%.Definition: The difference between the normal percentage of a shooter on shots throughout the season and the percentage on shots when the defensive player or team is guarding the shooter. A good defensive number will be negative because the defensive player holds their opponent to a lower percentage than normal Formula FG% - DFG%

dist. feet.Name: Distance Feet
dist. feet.Definition: Distance run by a player or team measured in feet

dist. miles.Name: Distance Miles
dist. miles.Definition: Distance run by a player or team measured in miles Formula (Dist. Feet)/5280

dist. miles def.Name: Distance Miles Defense
dist. miles def.Definition: Miles run by a player or team while on defense

dist. miles off.Name: Distance Miles Offense
dist. miles off.Definition: Miles run by a player or team while on offense

dreb.Name: Defensive Rebounds
dreb.Definition: The number of rebounds a player or team has collected while they were on defense

dreb chance%.Name: Defensive Rebounds Chance Percentage
dreb chance%.Definition: The percentage of defensive rebounds a player recovers compared to the number of defensive rebounding chances Formula (DREB)/(DREB Chances)

dreb chances.Name: Defensive Rebound Chances
dreb chances.Definition: When on defense, a player has a defensive rebound chance if they are the closest player to the ball at any point in time between when the ball has crossed below the rim to when it is fully rebounded

dreb%.Name: Defensive Rebounding Percentage
dreb%.Definition: The percentage of available defensive rebounds a player or team obtains while on the floor.

drive fg%.Name: Drive Field Goal Percentage
drive fg%.Definition: The field goal percentage of a player or team on drives to the basket

drive pts.Name: Drive Points
drive pts.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on drives to the basket

drives.Name: Drives
drives.Definition: When a player attacks the basket off the dribble in the halfcourt offense. Does not include situations where the player starts close to the basket, catches on the move, or immediately gets cut off on the perimeter

efg%.Name: Effective Field Goal Percentage
efg%.Definition: Measures field goal percentage adjusting for made 3-point field goals being 1.5 times more valuable than made 2-point field goals. Formula ((FGM + (0.5 * 3PM)) / FGA

elbow touch.Definition: Any touch where the player receives the ball near the free throw line

elbow touch fg%.Name: Elbow Touch FG%
elbow touch fg%.Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on touches at the elbow

elbow touch pts.Name: Elbow Touch Points
elbow touch pts.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on touches at the elbow

fbps.Name: Fast Break Points
fbps.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team while on a fast break

fg%.Name: Field Goal Percentage
fg%.Definition: The percentage of field goal attempts that a player makes Formula (FGM)/(FGA)

fga.Name: Field Goals Attempted
fga.Definition: The number of field goals that a player or team has attempted. This includes both 2 pointers and 3 pointers

fga per 100 events.Definition: Field Goal Attempts by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

fgm.Name: Field Goals Made
fgm.Definition: The number of field goals that a player or team has made. This includes both 2 pointers and 3 pointers

fgm %ast.Name: Percent of Field Goals Made Assisted
fgm %ast.Definition: The percentage of total field goals made by a player or team that are assisted by a teammate

fgm %uast.Name: Field Goals Made (Unassisted)
fgm %uast.Definition: The percentage of field goals made that are not assisted by a teammate

fifteen break left.Name: Fifteen Break Left
fifteen break left.Definition: A player takes five shots from the left break and 15 feet away from the basket

fifteen break right.Name: Fifteen Break Right
fifteen break right.Definition: A player takes five shots from the right break and 15 feet away from the basket

fifteen corner left.Name: Fifteen Corner Left
fifteen corner left.Definition: A player takes five shots from the left baseline and 15 feet away from the basket

fifteen corner right.Name: Fifteen Corner Right
fifteen corner right.Definition: A player takes five shots from the right baseline and 15 feet away from the basket

fifteen top key.Name: Fifteen Top Key
fifteen top key.Definition: A player takes five shots from the top of the key and 15 feet away from the basket

fp.Name: Fantasy Points
fp.Definition: The number of fantasy points a player accumulates Formula Pts: 1 Rebs: 1.2 Ast: 1.5 Stl: 3 Blocks: 3 TO: -1

freq.Name: Frequency
freq.Definition: The number of events that occur that fit the specified criteria based on the number of events overall

front ct touches.Name: Front Court Touches
front ct touches.Definition: The number of touches made by a player or team in the front court

ft assists.Name: Free Throw Assists
ft assists.Definition: A player is awarded a free throw assist if they passed the ball to a player who drew a shooting foul within one dribble of receiving the pass

ft freq.Name: Free Throw Frequency
ft freq.Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team shoots free throws as the result of a foul

ft%.Name: Free Throw Percentage
ft%.Definition: The percentage of free throw attempts that a player or team has made Formula (FTM)/(FTA)

fta.Name: Free Throws Attempted
fta.Definition: The number of free throws that a player or team has attempted

fta rate.Name: Free Throw Attempt Rate
fta rate.Definition: The number of free throw attempts a team shoots in comparison to the number of field goal attempts that team shoots Formula (FTA)/(FGA)

ftm.Name: Free Throws Made
ftm.Definition: The number of free throws that a player or team has made

g.Name: Games
g.Definition: The number of games a player or team played where a specified criteria occured

hand length (inches).Name: Hand Length (inches)
hand length (inches).Definition: Length of the Prospect's hand in inches. The measurement is taken from the bottom of the player's palm to the tip of his middle finger

hand width (inches).Name: Hand Width (inches)
hand width (inches).Definition: Width of the Prospects hand in inches. The measurement is taken from the player's outstretched hand from the tip of the thumb to tip of the pinky finger

height w/ shoes.Name: Height with Shoes
height w/ shoes.Definition: Height of the player while wearing shoes

height w/o shoes.Name: Height without Shoes
height w/o shoes.Definition: Height of the player without wearing shoes

help blk.Name: Helped Blocks
help blk.Definition: The number of blocks a defensive player recorded on a different defensive player than the one he was matched up with

help blk rec.Name: Helped Blocks Received
help blk rec.Definition: The number of times an offensive player’s shot was blocked by a different defensive player than the one he was matched up with

l.Name: Losses
l.Definition: The number of games lost by a player or team

lane agility time (seconds).Name: Lane Agility (seconds)
lane agility time (seconds).Definition: The time result of the drill that measures lateral quickness and the player's agility

loose balls recovered.Name: Loose Balls Recovered
loose balls recovered.Definition: The number of times a player or team gains sole possession of a live ball that is not in the control of either team

max bench press (repetitions).Name: Max Bench Press (repetitions)
max bench press (repetitions).Definition: The number of bench press repetitions at 185 lbs

max vertical leap (inches).Name: Max Vertical Leap (inches)
max vertical leap (inches).Definition: The vertical leap of a player with a few steps to start and gather his leap

min.Name: Minutes Played
min.Definition: The number of minutes played by a player or team

nba break left.Name: NBA Break Left
nba break left.Definition: A player takes five shots from the left break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

nba break right.Name: NBA Break Right
nba break right.Definition: A player takes five shots from the right break area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

nba corner left.Name: NBA Corner Left
nba corner left.Definition: A player takes five shots from the left corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

nba corner right.Name: NBA Corner Right
nba corner right.Definition: A player takes five shots from the right corner area of the court. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

nba top key.Name: NBA Top Key
nba top key.Definition: A player takes five shots from top of the key. The shot is from the distance of an NBA three pointer (23 ft. 9 in.)

netrtg.Name: Net Rating
netrtg.Definition: Measures a team's point differential per 100 possessions. On player level this statistic is the team's point differential per 100 possessions while he is on court. Formula OFFRTG - DEFRTG

off dribble college break left.Name: Off Dribble College Break Left
off dribble college break left.Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from the left break area of the court. The shot is from about the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

off dribble college break right.Name: Off Dribble College Break Right
off dribble college break right.Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from the right break area of the court. The shot is from about the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

off dribble college top key.Name: Off Dribble College Top Key
off dribble college top key.Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from the top of the key. The shot is from about the distance of a college three pointer (20 ft. 9 in.)

off dribble fifteen break left.Name: Off Dribble Fifteen Break Left
off dribble fifteen break left.Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from 15 feet away from the basket on the left break area of the court

off dribble fifteen break right.Name: Off Dribble FIfteen Break Right
off dribble fifteen break right.Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from 15 feet away from the basket on the right break area of the court

off dribble fifteen top key.Name: Off Dribble Fifteen Top Key
off dribble fifteen top key.Definition: A player takes six shots coming off the dribble from 15 feet out at the top of the key

off fls.Name: Offensive Fouls
off fls.Definition: The number of offensive fouls an offensive player committed while being guarded by a specific defensive player

off mu%.Name: Offensive Matchup Percentage
off mu%.Definition: The percentage of an offensive player’s overall possessions where he was guarded by a specific defensive player

offrtg.Name: Offensive Rating
offrtg.Definition: Measures a team's points scored per 100 possessions. On a player level this statistic is team points scored per 100 possessions while he is on court Formula 100*((Points)/(POSS)

on the move college.Name: On The Move College
on the move college.Definition: 35 seconds to attempt as many shots as time allows from college 3-pt range (20 ft. 9 in.) while moving between spots (corners and elbows from both sides)

on the move fifteen.Name: On The Move Fifteen
on the move fifteen.Definition: 35 seconds to attempt as many shots as time allows from 15 feet while moving between spots (corners and elbows from both sides)

opp 2nd pts.Name: Opponent 2nd Chance Points
opp 2nd pts.Definition: The number of points an opposing player or team scores on possessions where the opposing team rebounds the ball on offense

opp 3p%.Name: Opponent Three Point Percentage
opp 3p%.Definition: The percentage of 3 point attempts that are made by an opponent

opp 3pa.Name: Opponent Three Point Attempted
opp 3pa.Definition: The number of 3 point field goals attempted by an opposing player or team

opp 3pm.Name: Opponent Three Point Made
opp 3pm.Definition: The number of 3 point field goals made by an opposing player or team

opp ast.Name: Opponent Assists
opp ast.Definition: Number of times an opponent has registered an assist

opp blk.Name: Opponent Blocked Shots
opp blk.Definition: Number of times an opponent has registered a block on the shot of a player or team

opp blka.Name: Opponent Blocks Against
opp blka.Definition: An opponent's number of shot attempts that are blocked

opp dreb.Name: Opponent Defensive Rebounds
opp dreb.Definition: An opponent's number of defensive rebounds collected

opp efg%.Name: Opponent Effective Field Goal Percentage
opp efg%.Definition: An opponent's field goal percentage that is adjusted for made 3 pointers being 1.5 times more valuable than a 2 point shot Formula ((FGM + (0.5 * 3PM))/FGA

opp fbps.Name: Opponent Fast Break Points
opp fbps.Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team while on a fast break

opp fg%.Name: Opponent Field Goal Percentage
opp fg%.Definition: The percentage of field goal attempts that are made by an opponent

opp fga.Name: Opponent Field Goals Attempted
opp fga.Definition: An opponent's number of field goals attempted

opp fgm.Name: Opponent Field Goals Made
opp fgm.Definition: An opponent's number of field goals made

opp ft%.Name: Opponent Free Throw Percentage
opp ft%.Definition: The percentage of free throw attempts that are made by an opponent

opp fta.Name: Opponent Free Throw Attempted
opp fta.Definition: An opponent's number of free throws attempted

opp fta rate.Name: Opponent Free Throw Attempt Rate
opp fta rate.Definition: The number of free throw attempts a player or team allows in comparison to the number of shot attempts that player or team allows Formula (Opp FTA)/(Opp FGA)

opp ftm.Name: Opponent Free Throw Made
opp ftm.Definition: An opponent's number of free throws made

opp oreb.Name: Opponent Offensive Rebounds
opp oreb.Definition: The number of offensive rebounds obtained by an opposing player or team

opp oreb%.Name: Opponent Offensive Rebounding Percentage
opp oreb%.Definition: The percentage of available offensive rebounds an opponent obtains while a specific player is on the court

opp pf.Name: Opponent Personal Fouls
opp pf.Definition: The number of personal fouls committed by an opposing player or team

opp pfd.Name: Opponent Personal Fouls Drawn
opp pfd.Definition: The number of personal fouls drawn by an opposing player or team

opp pitp.Name: Opponent Points in the Paint
opp pitp.Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team in the paint

opp pts.Name: Opponent Points
opp pts.Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team

opp pts off to.Name: Opponent Points off Turnovers
opp pts off to.Definition: The number of points scored by an opposing player or team following a turnover

opp reb.Name: Opponent Total Rebounds
opp reb.Definition: The number of total rebounds obtained by an opposing player or team

opp stl.Name: Opponent Steals
opp stl.Definition: The number of steals obtained by an opposing player or team

opp tov.Name: Opponent Turnovers
opp tov.Definition: The number of times an opponent on offense loses the ball to the defense

opp tov%.Name: Opponent Turnover Percentage
opp tov%.Definition: The number of turnovers an opponent averages per 100 of their own possessions

oreb.Name: Offensive Rebounds
oreb.Definition: The number of rebounds a player or team has collected while they were on offense

oreb chance%.Name: Offensive Rebound Chance Percentage
oreb chance%.Definition: The percentage of offensive rebounds a player or team recovers compared to the number of offensive rebounding chances Formula (OREB)/(OREB Chances)

oreb chances.Name: Offensive Rebound Chances
oreb chances.Definition: When on offense, a player has a offensive rebound chance if they are the closest player to the ball at any point in time between when the ball has crossed below the rim to when it is fully rebounded

oreb%.Name: Offensive Rebounding Percentage
oreb%.Definition: The percentage of available offensive rebounds a player or team obtains while on the floor

pace.Name: Pace
pace.Definition: The number of possessions per 48 minutes for a team or player.

paint touch.Definition: Any touch were the player receives the ball inside the 3-second lane

paint touch fg%.Name: Paint Touch Field Goal Percentage
paint touch fg%.Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on touches in the paint

paint touch pts.Name: Paint Touch Points
paint touch pts.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on touches in the paint

pass.Name: Passes
pass.Definition: The number of passes made to or received from the given player or team

pass%.Name: Pass Percentage
pass%.Definition: Percentage of times a player passes

passes made.Name: Passes Made
passes made.Definition: The number of total passes made by a player or team per game

passes received.Name: Passes Received
passes received.Definition: The number of total passes received by a player or team per game

pass per 100 events.Definition: Passes by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

percentile.Name: Percentile
percentile.Definition: A player or team's points per possession ranked against the rest of the league. The percentage value is the percent of eligible players with an inferior points per possession than the selected player or team. *10 Possession minimum

pf.Name: Personal Fouls
pf.Definition: The number of personal fouls a player or team committed

pfd.Name: Personal Fouls Drawn
pfd.Definition: The number of personal fouls that are drawn by a player or team

pie.Name: Player Impact Estimate
pie.Definition: PIE measures a player's overall statistical contribution against the total statistics in games they play in. PIE yields results which are comparable to other advanced statistics (e.g. PER) using a simple formula. Formula (PTS + FGM + FTM - FGA - FTA + DREB + (.5 * OREB) + AST + STL + (.5 * BLK) - PF - TO) / (GmPTS + GmFGM + GmFTM - GmFGA - GmFTA + GmDREB + (.5 * GmOREB) + GmAST + GmSTL + (.5 * GmBLK) - GmPF - GmTO)

pitp.Name: Points In The Paint
pitp.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team in the paint

player points per 100 events.Definition: Points scored by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

player pts diff.Name: Player Points Difference
player pts diff.Definition: An offensive player’s Points per 100 Possessions in a specific matchup compared to his season average Points per 100 Possessions. Formula 100*(Matchup Player Points/Matchup Possessions) – Player’s Season Average Points per 100 Possessions

poss.Name: Possessions
poss.Definition: The number of possessions played by a player or team. Please note: an Offensive Rebound does not create another possession, it simply makes the existing possession longer.

post touch fg%.Name: Post Touch Field Goal Percentage
post touch fg%.Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on touches in the post

post touch pts.Name: Post Touch Points
post touch pts.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on touches in the post

post touches.Name: Post Touches
post touches.Definition: The number of touches made by a player or team in the post

potential ast.Name: Potential Assists
potential ast.Definition: Any pass to a teammate who shoots within 1 dribble of receiving the ball

ppp.Name: Points Per Possession
ppp.Definition: The number of points a player or team scores per possession

pts off to.Name: Points off Turnovers
pts off to.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team following an opponent's turnover

pts per elbow touch.Name: Points per Elbow Touch
pts per elbow touch.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per elbow touch

pts per paint touch.Name: Points per Paint Touch
pts per paint touch.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per paint touch

pts per post touch.Name: Points per Post Touch
pts per post touch.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per post touch

pts per touch.Name: Points per Touch
pts per touch.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team per touch

pull up fg%.Name: Pull Up Field Goal Percentage
pull up fg%.Definition: The field goal percentage by a player or team on Pull Up shots

pull up pts.Name: Pull Up Points
pull up pts.Definition: The number of points scored by a player or team on Pull Up shots

reb.Name: Rebounds
reb.Definition: A rebound occurs when a player recovers the ball after a missed shot. This statistic is the number of total rebounds a player or team has collected on either offense or defense

reb chance%.Name: Rebound Chance Percentage
reb chance%.Definition: The percentage of rebounds a player or team recovers compared to the number of rebounding chances Formula (REB)/(REB Chances)

reb chances.Name: Rebound Chances
reb chances.Definition: A player has a rebound chance if they are the closest player to the ball at any point in time between when the ball has crossed below the rim to when it is fully rebounded

reb%.Name: Rebounding Percentage
reb%.Definition: The percentage of available rebounds a player or team grabbed while on the floor

sast.Name: Screen Assists
sast.Definition: The number of times an offensive player or team sets a screen for a teammate that directly leads to a made field goal by that teammate

score freq.Name: Score Frequency
score freq.Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team scores at least 1 point

secondary assist.Name: Secondary Assist
secondary assist.Definition: A player is awarded a secondary assist if they passed the ball to a player who recorded an assist within 1 second and without dribbling

shot at rim.Definition: Any shot with distance within 5 feet of the basket

sf freq.Name: Shooting Foul Frequency
sf freq.Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team shoots free throws as the result of a shooting foul

sfl.Name: Shooting Fouls
sfl.Definition: The number of shooting fouls a defensive player committed against his matchups

sfl per 100 events.Definition: Shooting Fouls Drawn by the player off that event type divided by the number of events for that player, multiplied by 100

shuttle run (seconds).Name: Shuttle Run (seconds)
shuttle run (seconds).Definition: The time result of the drill that measures a player's agility and ability to change directions

standing reach.Name: Standing Reach
standing reach.Definition: The reach of the player while standing still. The player reaches straight up to his highest point

standing vertical leap (inches).Name: Standing Vertical Leap (inches)
standing vertical leap (inches).Definition: The vertical leap of a player with no running start

stl.Name: Steals
stl.Definition: Number of times a defensive player or team takes the ball from a player on offense, causing a turnover

stl%.Name: Steals Percentage
stl%.Definition: The percentage of a team's steals that a player has while on the court

team pts diff.Name: Team Points Difference
team pts diff.Definition: An offensive player’s Team Points per 100 Possessions in a specific matchup compared to their season average Points per 100 Possessions. Formula 100*(Matchup Team Points/Matchup Possessions) – Team’s Season Average Points per 100 Possessions

team pts per 100 possessions.Name: Team Points Per 100 Possessions (on an event)
team pts per 100 possessions.Definition: Points scored by the team on possessions where there is an event for that player, divided by the number of unique possessions where there is an event for that player, multiplied by 100

td3.Name: Triple Doubles
td3.Definition: The number of triple-doubles (double-digit number total in three of the five categories in a game) a player achieves

three quarter sprint (seconds).Name: Three Quarter Sprint (seconds)
three quarter sprint (seconds).Definition: The time result of the drill where a player is timed in a sprint from the baseline to 3/4th the length of the court

time of poss.Name: Time of Possession
time of poss.Definition: The number of minutes that a player or team possesses the ball

to freq.Name: Turnover Frequency
to freq.Definition: The percentage of plays where a player or team commits a turnover

to ratio.Name: Turnover Ratio
to ratio.Definition: The number of turnovers a player or team averages per 100 possessions used Formula (TO * 100) / (POSS)

touches.Name: Touches
touches.Definition: The number of times a player or team touches and posseses the ball during the game

tov.Name: Turnovers
tov.Definition: A turnover occurs when the player or team on offense loses the ball to the defense

tov%.Name: Turnover Percentage
tov%.Definition: Percentage of plays that end in a player or team's turnover

tracking efg%.Definition: Effective Field Goal Percentage on shots off that event type

tracking player points.Definition: Points scored by the player off that event type

ts%.Name: True Shooting Percentage
ts%.Definition: A shooting percentage that factors in the value of three-point field goals and free throws in addition to conventional two-point field goals Formula Points/ [2*(Field Goals Attempted+0.44*Free Throws Attempted)]

uncontested dreb.Name: Uncontested Defensive Rebounds
uncontested dreb.Definition: The number of defensive rebounds gathered by a player or team while no opponent is within 3.5 feet

uncontested oreb.Name: Uncontested Offensive Rebounds
uncontested oreb.Definition: The number of offensive rebounds gathered by a player or team while no opponent is within 3.5 feet

uncontested reb.Name: Uncontested Rebounds
uncontested reb.Definition: The number of rebounds gathered by a player or team while no opponent is within 3.5 feet

usg%.Name: Usage Percentage
usg%.Definition: The percentage of team plays used by a player when he is on the floor Formula (FGA + Possession Ending FTA + TO) / POSS

w.Name: Wins
w.Definition: The number of games won by a player or team

win%.Name: Win Percentage
win%.Definition: The percentage of games played that a player or team has won Formula (W)/(GP)

wingspan.Name: Wingspan
wingspan.Definition: The player stretches his arms horizontally and a measure is made from the tip of his left hand to the tip of his right hand
